Html:
Hi guys,
I am making an application to use with Windows Mobile and I'm using GreatMaps, so far everything works! Wonderful API!!
But I am worried about the license to use the providers. 
Which one can I use for commercial application? 
I read the Google doesn't allow. I wanted a free one as good as google or ArcGIS.
Someone has any ideia which one should I use?

Thanks!
Thiarley

Hi,

First, thanks for your API which is very useful and very huge.

I also want to use Google Map provider for a commercial application. I have seen there is an API key for GoogleMapProvider.

Is it a public API key ? Is there a risk of black-listing ?

Our customers have their Google API key.  How we can use their key ?

Thanks for your answer,

Anthony
i doubt you can use google in commercial app, unless you have approval from them
